N-TVA; Pten f/f; H11LSL-Cas9 f/f; Ink4a/Arf f/f; ATRX f/f

brain looked hollow, fixed the entire brain just incase it was a rare brain tumor. Brainstem/spinal chord looked enlarged. Not a big enough tumor to justify fixing and freezing a portion, so I just trypsinized it for a cell line.
